abstract: Bank of America Chairman and Chief Executive Kenneth D. Lewis said it may take several quarters for the bank to repay its $45 billion of federal bailout money, although he believes the United States economy may bottom out in the second half of this year.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Chairman and Chief Executive Kenneth D. Lewis said it may take several quarters for the bank to repay its $45 billion of federal bailout money, although he believes the United States economy may bottom out in the second half of this year.

headline.main: BofA Says Repaying Loan Will Take Time

abstract: Some of India’s most successful businessmen, politicians and entertainers hear and heed their mothers’ advice daily.
snippet: Some of India’s most successful businessmen, politicians and entertainers hear and heed their mothers’ advice daily.
lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI  When the Indian composer A. R. Rahman accepted two Oscars for his work on “Slumdog Millionaire,” he saved his most effusive thanks for his mother.

headline.main: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle Can Call the Shots
headline.print_headline: In India, Hand That Rocks Cradle Also Calls Shots
